Performance:
May 1975: Kagekiyo and His Daughter

Production: May 1975

Play: Kagekiyo and His Daughter (嬢景清八嶋日記)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

Characters:

Wife of Hanabishiya's proprietor (Hanabishiya Nyōbō / 花菱屋女房)

Hanabishiya's proprietor (Hanabishiya osa / 花菱屋長)

Sajitayu (Kimoiri Sajidayū / 肝煎左治太夫)

Itotaki (Musume Itotaki / 娘糸滝)

Prostitute (Yūkun / 遊君)

Maid (Yarite / 遣り手)

Cook (Meshitaki onna / 飯焚き女)

Kyuzo (Kyūzō (Kyūza) / 久三)

Kojoro (Kojorō / 小女郎)

Kagekiyo (Akushichi Byōe Kagekiyo / 悪七兵衛景清)

Shiro (Amano Shirō / 天野四郎)

Gunnai (Tsuchiya Gunnai / 土屋軍内)

Boatman (Sendō / 船頭)

Samurai (Kinji / 近侍)
